get.description: The endpoint will retrieve all characters stored in the database with the movies they are in, and movies genres. By default, the endpoint will retrieve character's name, movie's title and genre with genre's name.

message.example: No data found, please try again.

get.summary: Get all characters with optional query params for specific values
get.description: Specific values can be retrieved for 'character', 'movie', and 'genre' by sending query params separated by a hyphen with no spaces. Example: 'http://localhost:5001/api/v1/characters?character=name-image-age&movie=title-image-rate&genre=name-id'.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: Character query params separated by '-'. Possible values are: id, image, name, age, weight, and history

parameters.name: movie
parameters.description: movie query params separated by '-'. Possible values are: id, image, title, description, details, date, rate, and genreId

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: genre query params separated by '-'. Possible values are: id, name, and image
